attributes.action: A minimum of 20% of City bonuses to be invested back into education and business start ups
attributes.additional_details: They were bailed out of the trouble they caused and they still get bonuses, whilst we are adamant that those that behaved badly during the riots are punished.  I believe they should be and I would be as furious if they were to get away with it as I am that the bankers did.  The government should impose some moral justice on those receiving immense bonuses.  .
